EmailTemplate.subject: Watch Forum 2022 sessions on demand
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Forum The Global Community Advancing Virtual Care
Forum header image
Full roster of Forum content now available!
Forum 2022 may be over, but now you can rewatch your favorite presentations or catch any you may have missed.
Access on-demand content now <[[https://forum2022.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=es&utm_term=non-registrant]]>
35+ SESSIONS featuring speakers from Kaiser Permanente, Geisinger, Microsoft, Delta Airlines, SAP, Jefferson Health, TRICARE Health Plan, Segal Consulting and more
8 INSPIRING GENERAL SESSIONS from industry thought leaders like Dr. Meena Seshamani of CMS discussing the future of Medicare, an exploration of health equity with Dr. Bechara Choucair of Kaiser Permanente, a glimpse into the post-Covid policy landscape with Ann Mond Johnson, a reimagining of the healthcare experience from Dr. David Rhew of Microsoft, and so much more.
7 PERSPECTIVE PANELS on topics that matter to you—consumer expectations in healthcare, health equity, hospital-to-home, mental health and more
Access on-demand content now <[[https://forum2022.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=es&utm_term=non-registrant]]>
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
